column1: Go through the attached HR policy document of my organization and provide details on leave entitlement, including vacation, sick leave, and other types of leave?

Review the attached HR policy document and list all protected classes against workplace harassment. Include any additional categories beyond standard legal protections that the organization recognizes.

Review the attached HR policy document and provide a detailed list of employee benefits, including health, dental, and vision coverage. Specify what percentage of the health insurance premium is covered by the organization and what portion employees are responsible for?

Review the attached HR policy document and outline the process for requesting reimbursement for work-related expenses. Include approval requirements, expected timelines, and the necessary documentation needed for submission?

Review the attached HR policy document and summarize the expectations for work hours and remote work. Include any core availability requirements, meeting attendance expectations, and guidelines for communicating availability to colleagues
